Interaction.name: Interaction
Interaction.description: Represents an interaction (phone call, in-person meeting, or video conference) between two or more people (attendees), typically including at least one representative and one customer or partner.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the customer or partner who attended the interaction.

EndTime.description: The date and time that the interaction ended.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastSyncedDateTime.description: The date and time when a sync was performed to create or update an interaction from an email client or other solutions in Salesforce.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ReferenceIdentifier.description: The unique reference ID of the interaction.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

StartTime.description: The date and time that the interaction started.
